title: Tim Wendelboe French Press Technique
preparation_steps: Grind 28 grams of coffee to medium-fine consistency
Pre-warm French Press with hot water
Add 28g ground coffee to French Press

brewing_steps.instruction: Start timer and pour 450g hot water in circular motion
brewing_steps.audio_script: Start the timer. Pour 450 grams of hot water in a circular motion. You have 25 seconds. Ensure all grounds are fully thoroughly wet for a consistent bloom.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Vierte 450g de agua en movimiento circular.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Vierte 450 gramos de agua caliente en movimiento circular para saturar todo el café uniformemente.

brewing_steps.instruction: Stir gently 3 times back-to-front to create even extraction
brewing_steps.audio_script: Stir gently 3 times back-to-front. You have 30 seconds. This agitation helps distribute the heat and ensures even extraction across the coffee bed.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Revuelve suavemente 3 veces de adelante hacia atrás para asegurar extracción uniforme.

brewing_steps.instruction: Place lid on top, do not press plunger
brewing_steps.audio_script: Place the lid on top now, but do not press. We want to trap the aromatics inside while the coffee steeps.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Coloca la tapa encima, no presiones el émbolo.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Coloca la tapa encima ahora, pero no presiones. Queremos atrapar los aromas mientras el café reposa.

brewing_steps.audio_script: Now wait for 4 minutes. Let the coffee steep. This is where the sweetness and body develop. Patience here is key.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Ahora espera 4 minutos. Deja que el café repose. Aquí es donde se desarrolla la dulzura y el cuerpo. La paciencia es clave.

brewing_steps.instruction: Press plunger down slowly, pour within 30 seconds
brewing_steps.audio_script: Finally, press the plunger down slowly. Aim to finish and pour within 30 seconds. Pouring immediately stops the brewing and preserves the clean flavor profile.
brewing_steps.instruction_es: Presiona el émbolo lentamente, sirve en 30 segundos.
brewing_steps.audio_script_es: Finalmente, presiona el émbolo hacia abajo lentamente. Apunta a terminar y servir en 30 segundos. Servir inmediatamente detiene la preparación y preserva el perfil de sabor limpio.

what_to_expect.description: Tim Wendelboe's French Press method emphasizes precision and control. Using a medium-fine grind and a shorter extraction time produces a brighter, more nuanced cup while maintaining the characteristic body of French Press coffee.
what_to_expect.audio_script: Tim Wendelboe's method emphasizes precision. By using a slightly finer grind and a shorter extraction time, we produce a brighter, more nuanced cup that still retains the classic French Press body.
what_to_expect.description_es: El método de Tim Wendelboe usa temperatura alta para extracción completa. Produce una taza con cuerpo completo y sabores brillantes.
what_to_expect.audio_script_es: Tim Wendelboe usa temperatura alta para extracción completa. La temperatura de 96 grados extrae todos los sabores brillantes mientras mantiene cuerpo completo.

notes: Tim Wendelboe's French Press method emphasizes precision and control. Using medium-fine grind and shorter extraction time produces a brighter, more nuanced cup while maintaining the characteristic body of French Press coffee.
notes_es: El método refinado de Tim Wendelboe con temperatura alta y tiempo preciso.
preparation_steps_es: Calienta el agua a 96°C (justo después de hervir).
Muele 28g de café a molienda medio-gruesa.
